name: Laura Kightlinger
bio: Laura Kightlinger is a prolific stand up comic with three HBO half-hour specials and four Comedy Central specials under her Spanx. She was a series regular on HBO’s Lucky Louie; created and starred in her own series, The Minor Accomplishments of Jackie Woodman on IFC. Her book, “Quick Shots of False Hope”, has been adapted for a TV series. She can be seen in Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life, this fall. Kightlinger continues to throw shit against the wall in TV, film, animation and the black arts.
